Whenever [[Naruto Uzumaki]] entered into a [[Jinchūriki Forms|tailed form]], the [[First Hokage's Necklace]] activated this technique to restrain him. It is unknown if the technique just restrains Naruto until Yamato is able to suppress the [[Nine-Tails]]' influence or if it suppresses the influence by itself as the Nine-Tails cancelled the technique by crushing the necklace.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 438, pages 2-4</ref>
